review: We are new to streaming video and started out with a Samsung bluray/streaming combo by son gave me for my birthday. We had problems from the beginning with buffering and freezing. My nerd somn diagnosed the problem as my high speed internet. At 40mbps I should not have issues. Talked with internet customer service, gave up on them (they always have crappy customer service) and changed my speed to 20 mbps since 40 didn't work anyway. My Sansung was not compatible with Amazon Fire so I had not been using the service for the year and a half that I have been a Prime member. Thought I would give Fire a shot, I could return it if there was  no improvement.It was day and night! Fire streams Prime video and Netflix seamlessly. No buffering issues. No freezing. Great picture quality. Good selection.I couldn't be more pleased. Of course, as usual, service, price, and delivery were outstanding. I highly recommend Prime for all it offers and Fire for streaming video.
